column4: i have two similar directories I want to smash them together how
more specifically, do you wish to overwrite files with the same name, or keep the latest versions?
I think what you are looking for is rsync

There is also a program called unison which helps maintain the sync between two directories, like for backup purposes, however it only works to maintain because it needs to monitor the directories.  Everything has to be "untangled" first.
